item.title: Gray's Peak
item.description: Gray’s Gray’s is a rather easy 14’er about an hour west of Denver. 14er Link Details Coordinates: 39.66087, -105.78462 Elevation: 11,280' Trailhead Access: High Clearence Vehicle Camping: Yeah Restrooms: Yeah The Approach I borrowed an SUV. It was a doable drive. I kept her in first gear and took it slow. There were a few sketchy parts along the way.. but it really wasn’t too bad.. at least in the right vehicle.
